name: Remember to Vote!
description: This extension shows you your polling location, and reminds you of deadlines and election days.
content_security_policy: default-src 'none'; style-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://apis.google.com; connect-src maps.googleapis.com; img-src http://*.gov; frame-src 'self' https://content.googleapis.com https://accounts.google.com
